ElickFeatures.title: Elick
ElickFeatures.description: The ultimate evolution of dictionaries: reducing word lookup time from minutes to seconds, improving efficiency by
ElickFeatures.aiDescription: Use AI to help you look up words, skip tedious steps, and get the most accurate meaning of words directly.
ElickFeatures.featuresDescription: Elick achieves revolutionary simplification of the word lookup process, making reading experience more fluent and natural
ElickFeatures.systemRequirements: Supports macOS 10.14+, Windows 10+ and Chrome browser

oneClick.title: One-Click Explanation
oneClick.description: Select a word and use hotkey to instantly pop up explanation window nearby

autoContext.title: Auto Context Capture
autoContext.description: No need to manually copy sentences, automatically identifies the complete sentence containing the word

preciseMeaning.title: Contextual Precise Explanation
preciseMeaning.description: Provides accurate word meaning based on context, not all possible meanings

fastQuery.title: Lightning Fast Query
fastQuery.description: Entire word lookup process shortened to under 10 seconds, doesn't interrupt reading immersion

furtherQuestion.title: Further Questions
furtherQuestion.description: Can continue asking questions if needed, like having a tutor available anytime

crossPlatform.title: Works Anywhere
crossPlatform.description: Works anywhere on your computer, no need to switch to ChatGPT

problems: Traditional dictionaries only show all meanings, requiring manual context judgment
Requires copy-paste and frequent interface switching
Complex lookup process interrupts reading flow
solutions: Direct contextual meaning, not all definitions
ElickFeatures.roadmapDescription: Discover completed features and upcoming new capabilities
ElickFeatures.openSourceNotice: This project is developed based on OpenAI translator, following the AGPLv3 open source license, source code can be downloaded from
ElickFeatures.subtitle: The Ultimate Word Lookup Solution
ElickFeatures.heroSectionDescription: See how Elick revolutionizes word lookup experience, from tedious multi-step operations to one-click intelligent explanations

convenient.title: More Convenient:
convenient.descriptionEnd: (web pages, readers, or video subtitles), one click to get the best explanation

faster.title: Faster:
faster.description: Reduce word lookup time from minutes to seconds, improving efficiency by

alerts.macNotSupported: Sorry, the current version does not support your system architecture. Please try again later or contact customer service.

status.currentVersionNotSupported: The current version does not support your system architecture. Please try again later.
status.currentVersionNotSupportedWindows: The current version does not support Windows system. Please try again later.
status.mobileNotSupportedDescription: Elick is a desktop application that currently only supports Windows and macOS systems. Please visit this page on your computer to download and use.
status.otherPlatformNotSupported: Elick currently only supports Windows and macOS desktop systems. If you are using another operating system, please contact us for support information.

DictionaryEvolution.bankSentence: "The syzygy of the planets last night left even seasoned astronomers in awe."
DictionaryEvolution.advancedFlow: More fluid operation based on ChatGPT

paper.title: Paper Dictionary
paper.subtitle: Traditional lookup
steps: Open dictionary to section S based on first letter of 'syzygy'
Use second letter 'y' to narrow down location
problems: Must determine correct meaning from multiple definitions

electronic.title: Electronic Dictionary
electronic.subtitle: Digital lookup
electronic.judgeStep: Determine which meaning fits the context
problems: Must sift through many meanings to find the right one
Cannot combine sentence context for direct explanation
Outdated entries, often missing slang, internet terms, and abbreviations

chatgpt.title: ChatGPT
chatgpt.subtitle: AI-powered lookup
chatgpt.queryText: Please explain what 'syzygy' means in the sentence: 'The syzygy of the planets last night left even seasoned astronomers in awe.'
chatgpt.replyText: In this sentence, 'syzygy' refers to the astronomical alignment of celestial bodies. Based on 'planets' and 'astronomers in awe,' it clearly refers to the rare planetary alignment phenomenon.
advantages: Can input both word and sentence, unlike traditional dictionaries
Skip searching through multiple meaningsâ€”get the right one directly
Ask follow-up questions for better understanding

elick.title: Elick
elick.subtitle: One-click smart lookup
advantages: Works anywhereâ€”select any word for instant accurate meaning
Auto-captures sentence context, no copy-paste needed
No interface switching, maintains reading flow
Ask follow-up questions for deeper understanding

common.selectWordInstruction: Select word â†’ Hotkey â†’ Get explanation
common.bankDefinitionNote: Shows complete dictionary entry for 'syzygy' with multiple meanings
